meanings.definition: A person or business that sells stationery.
meanings.sent1: The stationers in the store were arranging colorful pens on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: I visited the stationers to buy some notebooks and pencils.
meanings.sent3: The stationers decided to have a race to see who could organize the paper clips faster.
meanings.sent4: The stationers were like busy bees buzzing around the shop, helping customers find the perfect supplies.
meanings.sent5: The stationers' shop was a treasure trove of paper, envelopes, and stickers.

meanings.definition: A person who works in a stationery shop.
meanings.sent1: The friendly stationers greeted customers with a smile as they entered the shop.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a stationers and enjoys helping people pick out the best cards.
meanings.sent3: The stationers joked that they should start a band using only office supplies as instruments.
meanings.sent4: The stationers' expertise in organizing shelves was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The stationers' knowledge of paper weights and sizes was impressive.

meanings.definition: A shop that sells stationery products.
meanings.sent1: I love visiting the stationers to browse through the latest notebooks and pens.
meanings.sent2: The stationers on the corner always has a great selection of greeting cards.
meanings.sent3: The stationers' shop was so popular that it became the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The stationers' shelves were like a rainbow of colors with all the different paper options.
meanings.sent5: The stationers' shop smelled of fresh paper and ink, creating a cozy atmosphere.
